section.heading: Rules; public information program.
section.text: Within 180 days from March 7, 1992, the Mayor shall issue rules to implement this chapter and, through public or private programs, shall maintain a child restraint seat loan program for residents of the District of Columbia, and make available to the public information about this chapter.

annotations.annotation: Delegation of authority under Law 4-194, see Mayor’s Order 83-174, June 23, 1983.
